Package tage.audio

Class AudioResource

java.lang.Object
tage.audio.Resource
tage.audio.AudioResource
Direct Known Subclasses:
JOALAudioResource
public abstract class AudioResource extends Resource
This class represents an audio resource in memory. It encapsulates the data loaded from a sound file.
Author:
Kenneth Barnett, Mike McShaffry Modified from the SAGE Audio package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz.
See Also:

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AudioFormat
    getAudioFormat()
    Returns the AudioFormat of the sound file.
    AudioResourceType
    getAudioType()
    Returns the AudioResourceType of the sound file.
    String
    getFileName()
    Returns the name of the sound file.
    boolean
    getIsLoaded()
    Returns true if the sound file has successfully been loaded into memory; false otherwise.
